name: Ecommerce (JavaScript)
desc: Built a full-stack e-commerce platform using MongoDB, Express.js, React (with Vite), and Node.js (MERN) with Bootstrap for responsive UI styling, Redux for state management, Razorpay for payment gateway, Mongoose for database connectivity using JavaScript (ES6+ with ESM) + SWC.

name: Ecommerce (TypeScript)
desc: Built a full-stack e-commerce platform using MongoDB, Express.js, React (with Vite), and Node.js (MERN) with Bootstrap for responsive UI styling, Redux for state management, Razorpay for payment gateway, Mongoose for database connectivity using TypeScript (ES6+ with ESM) + SWC.

name: Youtuber Page
desc: Built a full-stack web application for YouTuber using MongoDB, Express.js, React (with Vite), and Node.js (MERN) with Bootstrap for responsive UI styling, Redux for state management, Mongoose for database connectivity using JavaScript (ES6+ with ESM) + SWC.

name: Car Rentel
desc: Built a full-stack web application for car lending using MongoDB, Express.js, React (with Vite), and Node.js (MERN) with Bootstrap for responsive UI styling, Redux for state management, Razorpay for payment gateway, Mongoose for database connectivity using JavaScript (ES6+ with ESM) + SWC.

name: Food
desc: Built a full-stack web application for food order using MongoDB, Express.js, React (with CRA), and Node.js (MERN) with Bootstrap for responsive UI styling, Redux for state management, and Mongoose for database connectivity using JavaScript (ES6).

name: Hotel
desc: Built a full-stack web application for hotel management room booking using MongoDB, Express.js, React (with CRA), and Node.js (MERN) with Bootstrap for responsive UI styling, Redux for state management, and Mongoose for database connectivity using JavaScript (ES6).

name: Video Blog
desc: Built a full-stack web application for a video blog using MongoDB, Express.js, React (with CRA), and Node.js (MERN) with Bootstrap for responsive UI styling, Redux for state management, and Mongoose for database connectivity using JavaScript (ES6).
